question: What are the names of projects that were completed before 2022?
raw_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs
evidence_answer: Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs

An extended storm
drain towards the end of Clover Heights will help eliminate this issue.

timber with non-combustible materials.
